Key Arguments: The legislation is seen as a tool to prevent freedom of speech in Australia.
Freedom of speech is essential for democracy and should not be controlled by the government.
The proposed legislation could lead to oppression and suppression of diverse voices in Australia.
Notable Quotes: It is very concerning to me that the Communications Legislation Amendment (Combatting Misinformation and Disinformation) Bill 2023 is a tool to prevent freedom of speech in Australia.
Democracy is freedom of speech. Freedom of speech and expression, especially about political and other public issues, is the lifeblood of any democracy.
Please DO NOT silence your people, our nation. Do not make us an oppressed nation, preventing us the people of Australia from having the same opportunities, freedom, and benefits as others.
